ShadowQuest

Class GameObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • ShadowQuest.GameObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Item, Unit

    public abstract class GameObject
extends java.lang.Object
    A very broad super class encompassing all classes except camera All GameObjects have a position and are renderable, and hence have images associated with them. All GameObjects also have a name. *
    Author:
    Adrian Cheung

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      The image used when rendering the object

      The position on the map of the game object
